meanings.definition: The stage of meiosis in which homologous chromosomes begin to separate.
meanings.sent1: During diplotenes, chromosomes start to move apart.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study diplotenes to understand how chromosomes separate.
meanings.sent3: At the diplotenes party, the chromosomes decided to go their separate ways.
meanings.sent4: The chromosomes in diplotenes were like old friends drifting apart.
meanings.sent5: In diplotenes, the chromosomes wave goodbye as they part ways.

meanings.definition: The process of chromosome condensation during cell division.
meanings.sent1: Diplotenes involves the condensation of chromosomes.
meanings.sent2: Cells undergo diplotenes to prepare for division.
meanings.sent3: The chromosomes in diplotenes were getting cozy in their tiny space.
meanings.sent4: In diplotenes, the chromosomes huddle together like a crowded subway.
meanings.sent5: The condensation in diplotenes makes the chromosomes look like tiny beads.
